mdRecord.dcterms:title: Commencement, Virginia State College (Preparing to award Certificate of Merit to the Virginia Statesmen in the Service) Standing: President L. H. Foster and Brigadier General George A. Horkan. Seated: Dr. J.M. Gandy, Dean J. H. Johnston, and Dr. Jackson Davis.
